key_insights: Pre-commit data can be outdated - always verify with v2_compliance_checker

Smart Discovery: Agent-3's discover-during-execution approach also valid
recommendations: Message batching enhancement for high-velocity execution

Function-level violations (30+ lines) could be next refactoring target
